content:
Today I chose PR 12768 for discussion!

feat: two equiv involving Associates and nonZeroDivisors
Created by @Xavier Roblot (@xroblot) on 2024-05-08
Labels: awaiting-review, t-algebra

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
I hope it's still relevant -- it's only 10 days old! Are we really supposed to be triaging PRs like this?
Makes me click and review, so :shrug:
